channel.title: Help Portfowarding
channel.description:
Okay guys, i've hosted for years now..but i'm having problems. I've recently changed my modem from Comcast, to At&t modem. I knew how to portfoward on the Comcast but with this at&t shit it's weird. A portfowarding website is telling me to go there, but i dont know which one to choose. i already tried DNS server but it doesn't work. so i removed it. look at the picture below and if you have any idea on how i could fix this please let me know.
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2ln78m.jpg[/img]
by the way, im using the no-ip DUC client to host my server ip. so don't ask me if im using the program.

item.title: Help Portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

We don’t help with portforwarding questions here. Please use www.portforward.com.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @ytpingas ytpingas
item.description:
@ytpingas wrote:

I dont think that’s an error, i think thats a page your suppost to PF on or edit some stuff.

DONT REPCOPY MY POST!!!_________________________-----------------------------------------

Read full topic

item.title: Help Portfowarding
